- Updated pricing to show ranges instead of calculated prices, removed billing toggle and location multiplier
- Added "Coming Soon" badge to Outbound Voice Agent card
- Fixed mobile responsiveness issues in ProblemSolutionFeatures section (reduced padding, icon sizes, text sizes)
